Timing: zhufree
[Unknown residence]
Wu Da: Wu Da
Masked person: You may rise.
Wu Da: Thank you
Masked person: How are things progressing on Qi Yan’s end?
Where did old thief Nangong place her?
Wu Da: It is as the master expected.
Among the top three candidates of this exam
old thief Nangong selected two aristocratic sons
and one from a humble background.
Qi Yan… scored Flower Seeker
Masked person: Which high-ranking official has their eye on her?
Wu Da: Old thief Nangong arranged a marriage before an audience of officials
marrying off Nangong Jingnu to Qi Yan.
Masked person: Oh?
Now that is strange.
Considering how dearly that old thief Nangong treats his legitimate daughter
this arrangement should be implausible.
Did something else happen?
Wu Da: Oh
column6: was given an arrangement as well.

字幕内容: She was married off to the second son of the Commandant estate.
Lu Zhongxing.
Masked person: That explains it.
To old thief Nangong
She is the perfect chess piece he can use to ward danger off of his legitimate daughter.
Though…
If he can steel himself to marry off his most beloved daughter to one of lower status
the Commandant estate must have had designs on Nangong Jingnu
and old thief Nangong is also planning to make a move against the Commandant estate.
Wu Da: Master
字幕颜色: Qi Yan’s identity might not remain hidden for much longer

字幕内容: maybe we should give up on her while we can.
An assassination plan is much more reliable after all!
This humble one will lead the team this time!
Masked person: No.
Wu Da: Master?
Masked person: We already have two failed assassinations
do you think we will succeed on the third?
The storm outside has gradually calmed down in the past few years
this is a good time for us to permeate our forces into the court.
Another assassination attempt will only put that old thief back on his guard!
Can the debt of blood owed by the false court be covered by him alone?
The traitors who supported old thief Nangong back then
and the scum who clapped in joy
What I want is for this entire world to pay with their blood!
Qi Yan: Adapted from Jinjiang Literature City’s ‘Clear and Muddy Loss of Love’
an original work by Please Don’t Laugh
broadcasting exclusively on Maoer FM
‘Two Adamant Hearts’ audio drama season one
please enjoy.

Why don’t I see anyone here?
Nangong Jingnu: He’s gone…
Nangong Jingnu: Er-jie
You just recovered from a cold
Nangong Shunu: Mn
Nangong Shunu: Does xiao-mei still wish to learn the zither?
Nangong Shunu: Hm~
Nangong Shunu: What’s wrong?
Weren’t you so eager to learn just a moment ago?
Nangong Jingnu: Aiya! After seeing er-jie’s zither skills
I don’t think I’ll ever be able to catch up in a lifetime.
Nangong Shunu: Oh you~ Zither playing is nothing special
but Jingnu has strengths that other people can’t learn.
Nangong Jingnu: Really?
Nangong Shunu: Of course it’s true.
Meimei’s good points are not on the surface.
Those who know will naturally view it as a precious treasure
while those who don’t would not need to ask for it either.
You’ve been with me for most of the day
字幕颜色: you should go and see brother-in-law now.
